hero.title: About CleanAfricaNow

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At CleanAfricaNow, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.
privacy.infoCollectContent:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, submit a report, or contact us for support. This includes:

• Account information (name, email address, password)
• Report data (photos, descriptions, location coordinates)
• Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
• Usage data (how you interact with our platform)
privacy.infoUseContent:
We use the information we collect to:

• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Process and display environmental reports
• Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
• Respond to your comments, questions, and requests
• Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities
• Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions and abuse
privacy.infoShareContent:
We share information about you in the following circumstances:

• With government agencies and NGOs to help resolve reported issues
• With service providers who perform services on our behalf
• If we believe disclosure is required by law or to protect rights
• In connection with any merger, sale, or acquisition
• With your consent or at your direction
privacy.dataSecurityContent: We take reasonable measures to help protect information about you from loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. We use encryption for data in transit and at rest, and we regularly review our security practices.
privacy.yourRightsContent:
You have the right to:

• Access, update, or delete your personal information
• Object to processing of your personal information
• Request portability of your personal information
• Opt-out of marketing communications
• Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
privacy.dataRetentionContent: We retain personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including to satisfy legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. Environmental reports remain on the platform to maintain a historical record of issues and resolutions.
privacy.contactUsContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@cleanafricanow.com.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using CleanAfricaNow. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.acceptanceContent: By accessing or using CleanAfricaNow's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.useOfServiceContent:
CleanAfricaNow provides a platform for citizens to report environmental issues in their communities. Our services include:

• Environmental issue reporting and tracking
• Community engagement features
• Data visualization and mapping tools
• Notifications and updates on reported issues
terms.userContentContent:
You retain ownership of content you submit to the platform. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and display such content in connection with our services.

You agree not to submit content that:
• Is false, misleading, or fraudulent
• Violates any law or regulation
• Infringes on intellectual property rights
• Contains malicious code or spam
terms.prohibitedContent:
You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:

• Use the services in any way that violates laws or regulations
• Impersonate any person or entity
• Interfere with or disrupt the services
• Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
• Use automated means to access the services without permission
terms.disclaimerContent:
Our services are provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that:

• The services will be uninterrupted or error-free
• Results obtained from the services will be accurate
• Any errors in the services will be corrected
terms.liabilityContent: To the fullest extent permitted by law, CleanAfricaNow shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use of our services.
terms.changesContent: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page. Your continued use of the services after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how CleanAfricaNow uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our platform.
cookies.whatAreCookiesContent: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to website owners.
cookies.howWeUseContent:
CleanAfricaNow uses cookies for various purposes:

• Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and account access.

• Analytics Cookies: We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website. This helps us improve our services and user experience.

• Preference Cookies: These cookies remember your preferences, such as language selection and theme settings, to provide a more personalized experience.

• Authentication Cookies: These cookies help us identify you when you log in, so we can show you the appropriate content and features.
cookies.typesContent:
Session Cookies: These are temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser. They are used to maintain your session while you navigate our website.

Persistent Cookies: These cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them. They are used to remember your preferences and login information.

First-Party Cookies: These are cookies set by CleanAfricaNow directly when you visit our website.

Third-Party Cookies: These are cookies set by third-party services we use, such as analytics providers.
cookies.manageDesc: Most web browsers allow you to manage cookies through their settings. You can delete all cookies from your browser, block all cookies from being set, allow only first-party cookies, or block specific cookies. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

support.title: Support Center
support.subtitle: We're here to help. Find answers to common questions or reach out to our support team.
support.contactSupportDesc: Our support team is available to assist you.
support.emailSupportDesc: Get help via email within 24 hours
support.faq1Q: How do I submit an environmental report?
support.faq1A: Click on 'Report Issue' in the navigation menu, fill out the form with details about the issue, add photos if possible, and submit. Your report will be reviewed and added to the map.
support.faq2Q: What types of issues can I report?
support.faq2A: You can report various environmental issues including waste dumping, water pollution, air quality problems, noise pollution, illegal dumping, and deforestation.
support.faq3Q: How long does it take for a report to be processed?
support.faq3A: Reports are typically reviewed within 24-48 hours. Once approved, they appear on the public map. Resolution time depends on the local authorities and the nature of the issue.
support.faq4A: While you need an account to submit reports, your personal information is not displayed publicly. Only the report details and location are visible on the map.
support.faq5Q: How do I track the status of my report?
support.faq5A: Log in to your account and visit the Map page. Your reports will show their current status: Pending, In Progress, or Resolved.
support.faq6Q: What happens after I submit a report?
support.faq6A: Your report is reviewed by our team, then forwarded to the appropriate local authorities or NGOs. You'll receive updates as the status changes.

cities.featuredDesc: Report environmental issues in major Moroccan cities
